Reviews.Title: My mom loved it
Reviews.Author: loveskagen
Reviews.Content: Bought it for my mom and she liked it. She had always had a small phone but since buying this she likes it a lot. Delivery was on time

Reviews.Title: very poor phpne
Reviews.Author: Modeste Muhire
Reviews.Content: I cannot find a way to describe how disappointed I was with this product, it did not have even a way to change the messaging center number :( , the screen stopped working just after 3 months of use, for no reason, I would not recommend this product at all.
